responses: You are suffering from cold flu, you can further ask for preventions and precautions for flu

patterns: what are the precautions for flu

what are the precautions for cold flu
what are the preventions for cold flu
responses: Avoid close contact with people who are sick,Cover your mouth and nose,Clean your hands, Stay home and take sufficient rest and you will be back to normal soon.

patterns: what are the precautions for fever?
what measures should i take to cure fever?
responses: Here it is all you need to do, Drink warm water,keep yourself hydrated,Take haldi-milk twice a day,try to stay home,if temperature is high then have calpol paracetamol 500mg tablet after meal and dinner

responses: Your symptoms shows you have Asthma, If u need any further assistance feel free to ask.

patterns: What are the precautions for Asthma?
what measures should i take to cure Asthma?
responses: Don't panic and for detail diagnosing please visit pulmonologist. They can treat you with your lungs and respiratory issues.After x-ray, they will tell you how much it is infected. If you need any further assistance feel free to ask.

patterns: What are the precautions for Anxiety?
What measures should i take to cure Anxiety
responses: Its a clear sign of Anxiety, for this you need someone to talk to your close ones  or share your feelings and emotions, You should consult a Therapist. Take care and Not to worry.

patterns: I am having red rashes , fever and itchiness

i am having fever, muscle pain,red spots on my hands, face and all over my body i am scared what it might be?
responses: What i see is,you are facing is mild illness considered as Chickenpox, If You need to know more about its precautions or cure, feel free to ask.

patterns: What are the precautions for chickenpox?
What measures should i take to cure Chickenpox
responses: you need to stay indoor as virus should not spread much, do not scratch the spots as it can be incredibly itchy,wear cool clothing, keep yourself hydrated, if there is a sever and spreading infection, you must visit a nearby doctor.

patterns: I have stomach_pain,acidity and ulcers on tongue
I had vomiting,feel like acidity and ulcers on my tongue
responses: its a clear sign of Acid Reflux also called as Gastroesophageal reflux disease, or GERD. It is a digestive disorder that affects the ring of muscle between your esophagus and your stomach. This ring is called the lower esophageal sphincter (LES). If you have it, you may get heartburn or acid indigestion. Feel free to ask if you wanna know more about its treatment and cure.

patterns: What is the treatment for GRED
what measures do we need to take to cure GRED
What is the treatment for Gastroesophageal reflux disease
How do we cure Gastroesophageal reflux disease
what measures do we need to take to cure Gastroesophageal reflux disease
How do we cure Acid reflux
what measures do we need to take to cure acid reflux
responses: If you consult a doctor, they may suggest you  Antacids which help neutralise acid and stop heartburn,  Proton pump inhibitors which will help block a protein needed to make stomach acid or  prokinetics this will help you empty your stomach faster so that you wont have much acid left. Other precautions u must take are  avoid eating food like chocolate,peppermint, fatty foods caffeine and alcoholic beverages,  Eat slowly and smaller servings,  chew your food thoroughly,  Stop smoking and   stay at healthy weight.
